/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the sides of the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different shapes and colors are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of green, blue, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
